SQL.LOAD: SELECT list_price_id, lp.warranty_master_id, effective, expiration, lp.created_date, lp.modified_date, lp.created_by, lp.modified_by, d.dealer_id, d.dealer_name, d.dealer as dealer_code, sku_number, model_number, manufacturer_name, amount, amount_type_id FROM elp_list_price lp, elp_warranty_master wm, elp_dealer d WHERE lp.warranty_master_id = wm.warranty_master_id and wm.dealer_id = d.dealer_id and list_price_id = :list_price_id
SQL.LOAD_LIST_PRICE: SELECT list_price_id, lp.warranty_master_id, lp.amount, effective, expiration, lp.created_date, lp.modified_date, lp.created_by, lp.modified_by, d.dealer_id, d.dealer_name, d.dealer as dealer_code, sku_number, model_number, manufacturer_name FROM elp_list_price lp, elp_warranty_master wm, elp_dealer d WHERE lp.warranty_master_id = wm.warranty_master_id --dynamic_where_clause and wm.dealer_id = d.dealer_id and getcodefromlistitem(lp.AMOUNT_TYPE_ID) = 'LPRICE'
SQL.LOAD_LIST_ALL: SELECT list_price_id, lp.warranty_master_id, effective, expiration, lp.created_date, lp.modified_date, lp.created_by, lp.modified_by, d.dealer_id, d.dealer_name, d.dealer as dealer_code, sku_number, model_number, manufacturer_name, amount, amount_type_id, t.Translation amount_type_desc FROM elp_list_price lp inner join elp_warranty_master wm on lp.warranty_master_id = wm.warranty_master_id inner join elp_dealer d on wm.dealer_id = d.dealer_id inner join elp_list_item li on lp.amount_type_id = li.list_item_id INNER JOIN elp_dict_item_translation t ON t.DICT_ITEM_ID = li.DICT_ITEM_ID WHERE 1=1 and t.LANGUAGE_ID = :language_id --dynamic_where_clause
SQL.LOAD_REPAIR_AUTH_AMT: select lp.AMOUNT from elp_list_price lp inner join elp_warranty_master wm on lp.warranty_master_id = wm.warranty_master_id where getcodefromlistitem(lp.amount_type_id) = 'RAAMOUNT' and wm.dealer_id = :dealer_id and wm.sku_number = :sku_number and to_date(:effective, 'yyyymmdd') between lp.EFFECTIVE and lp.EXPIRATION
